title: Business owners are under investigation for pressuring employees to vote for Bolsonaro.
dc:creator: André Spigariol

media:content.media:credit: Victor Moriyama for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A rally for the candidate Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva in the state of Bahia, where an entrepreneur is being investigated by labor officials for attempting to force workers to vote for President Jair Bolsonaro.
